meanings.definition: A person or company that promotes or advertises a product or event.
meanings.sent1: The promotors handed out flyers to attract more customers to the store.
meanings.sent2: The social media team are the main promotors of the new product launch.
meanings.sent3: The promotors dressed up as superheroes to draw attention to the charity event.
meanings.sent4: The promotors are like the cheerleaders of the business world, rallying support for their products.
meanings.sent5: The promotors used catchy slogans to make the event unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Something that promotes or encourages growth or development.
meanings.sent1: Healthy soil acts as a promotor for plant growth in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Positive feedback can be a powerful promotor of employee motivation.
meanings.sent3: The sunshine is the best promotor for a happy mood on a summer day.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is a natural promotor of bonding between friends.
meanings.sent5: Education is a key promotor of progress in society.
